none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on April 06, 2015 Description from Terminal Escape:
Fast and raw Italian hardcore circa 1996. The whole thing is packaged in stapled cardboard at there are like five different inserts and a handwritten note about how half the band quit and they are looking for new members and are gonna keep playing...it's a time machine in cassette form, really. But the bonus is that the jams are really damn good - furious raw hardcore masking infectious hooks. As always, you're welcome. And I'm kinda sorry that I rarely (read: never) repair dead link, but I'm too busy (read: distracted). L'ALEPH
//1.bp.blogspot.com/-cv4TKhxouVk/VSIV7LxdJNI/AAAAAAAAMHc/htSmffPbFEI/s1600/L'ALEPH%2Bcover%2Bcopy.jpg //1.bp.blogspot.com/-kN1Ce3vR3i0/VSIXVY_xmUI/AAAAAAAAMHo/gye_YlxlA8A/s1600/L'ALEPH%2Bimg.jpg

seo.title: l'Aleph - L'Alpeh demo 1996 - Terminal Escape
